snippet: The agency says Mohammed Mark Amin, a producer of such films as "Frida" and "Eve's Bayou," and several of his family members traded on insider tips he learned about DuPont Fabros Technology, a publicly held company that operates and manages data...
abstract: The agency says Mohammed Mark Amin, a producer of such films as "Frida" and "Eve's Bayou," and several of his family members traded on insider tips he learned about DuPont Fabros Technology, a publicly held company that operates and manages data centers.

headline.main: Insider Trading Crackdown Ensnares Hollywood Producer
